name: Tumblr - Glee icon set
description: Replace your dashboard icons with some of Glee's best-known images: the loser sign, a Lima Bean mug, a slushie cup, a music symbol, and Rachel's star!

user.name: GeekintheJeep

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!
